remarks: Negate right side of alternating congruence.  Makes essential use of the "alternating" part.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 3-Oct-2014.)
statement: acongneg2 $p |- ( ( ( A e. ZZ /\ B e. ZZ /\ C e. ZZ ) /\ ( A || ( B - -u C ) \/ A || ( B - -u -u C ) ) ) -> ( A || ( B - C ) \/ A || ( B - -u C ) ) ) $.
